paper_abstract: Let U-n(+) be the set of bipartite unicyclic graphs with n vertices. In U-n(+), ordering the unicyclic graphs in terms of their maximal Estrada indices was considered. We deduce the first four and three unicyclic graphs in U-n(+) for n >= 23 and 22 >= n >= 8, respectively. For two bipartite graphs, we construct a relation between the Estrada index and the largest eigenvalue.
paper_title: Unicyclic Graph with Maximal Estrada Indices
